title: Spectator Out Loud: Katy Balls, Douglas Murray and Nigel Farndale
description: This week we’ll hear Katy Balls on the government’s dwindling COVID optimism (00:41), Douglas Murray’s prediction of a dull decade of arrested development (04:26) and finally Nigel Farndale of why we owe so much of what we love about the Olympics to the Nazis (12:50).
itunes:author: The Spectator
dc:creator: The Spectator
